title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can successfully authenticate using OAuth 2.0 with Microsoft Entra ID with valid credentials and multi-factor authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid user credentials.
Complete multi-factor authentication.
Submit the login form.
Verify that the user is redirected to the main dashboard.
Verify user session is established and role-based access controls are applied.

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that the system denies access for invalid OAuth login attempts and shows appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid user credentials.
Attempt to login.
Verify an error message is displayed indicating login failure.
Verify no session is created and access is denied.

title: Pre-Bill CDI Review Queue Prioritization
description: Verify that cases in the Pre-Bill CDI Review queue are prioritized correctly based on financial and clinical impact scores.

steps.description: Authenticate as CDI specialist and navigate to Pre-Bill Review page.
Load the prioritized cases queue.
Verify cases are sorted by combined financial impact and risk stratification scores.
Verify prioritization matches expected results from sample dataset.
Verify the queue updates correctly after user feedback or case updates.

title: Denial Letter PDF Upload and OCR Processing
description: Verify that uploaded denial letter PDFs are processed asynchronously with accurate OCR extraction of CARC/RARC codes and denial reasons (>95% accuracy).

steps.description: Authenticate user and navigate to denial letter upload.
Upload a valid denial letter PDF file.
Verify file upload is accepted and processing starts asynchronously.
Verify user receives notification upon processing completion.
Verify extracted CARC/RARC codes and denial reasons match expected values with >95% accuracy.

title: Automated Appeal Letter Generation with Evidence Citation
description: Verify AI-generated automated appeal letters synthesize clinical data and regulatory citations with traceable provenance and pass expert validation.

steps.description: Navigate to a denial case requiring appeal.
Trigger automated appeal letter generation.
Verify generated appeal letter includes appropriate clinical evidence and regulatory citations.
Verify evidence provenance links to source documents clearly.
Validate the appeal letter passes human expert review according to internal criteria.

title: Real-time KPI Monitoring Dashboard Refresh and Performance
description: Verify that the KPI dashboard updates data within 24 hours and UI queries respond within 2 seconds at 95th percentile under expected load.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the KPI Monitoring Dashboard.
Trigger data refresh or wait for scheduled update.
Verify dashboard displays denial rates, CDI quality scores, appeals success rates, and revenue metrics.
Verify data shown is not older than 24 hours.
Perform multiple KPI queries and drill-down on visualizations.
Verify UI query response times are under 2 seconds at 95th percentile.

title: Natural Language Query Interface Compliance and Accuracy
description: Verify the AI-powered natural language query interface accepts valid plain English queries, responds contextually, and enforces non-leading template compliance including HIPAA audit and unique query IDs.

steps.description: Navigate to the Natural Language Query interface.
Submit a valid clinical data query in plain English.
Verify relevant and contextual AI response is returned.
Attempt to submit a leading or non-compliant query template.
Verify the interface rejects the query and provides an explanatory message.
Verify each query is assigned a unique identifier and audit log entry compliant with HIPAA ยง164.312.

title: Appeal Tracking and Management Dashboard Functionality
description: Verify that managers can track appeal lifecycle statuses, manage deadlines, and view success analytics with accurate drill-down and charting capabilities.

steps.description: Log in as manager and navigate to Appeal Tracking dashboard.
Verify appeal statuses (e.g., Draft, Submitted, Approved, Denied) are displayed accurately.
Verify deadline alerts and warnings appear for pending appeals.
Use interactive charts to drill down into appeal success analytics.
Verify data is consistent with back-end records.

title: Case Management Workflow for Creation, Review, and Submission
description: Verify users can create new cases, review AI-assisted documentation recommendations, and submit cases for appeals processing following defined workflows.

steps.description: Navigate to Case Management page.
Create a new case with required data.
Verify case creation succeeds and appears in case list.
Open case for review and view AI-generated documentation improvement recommendations.
Verify recommendations are relevant and actionable.
Submit the case for appeals processing.
Verify submission status updates accordingly.

title: System Uptime and Database Health Monitoring
description: Verify system health monitoring dashboards report real-time status maintaining 99.9% uptime SLA and database connection health indicators are accurate and timely.

steps.description: Simulate normal system operation and monitor health dashboard.
Verify database connection status shows healthy.
Simulate database connectivity issues and verify health dashboard updates accordingly.
Verify alerts or notifications are triggered for degraded health.
Verify system uptime metrics meet 99.9% SLA under load of 1000 concurrent users.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that role-based access controls restrict access to sensitive features and data based on user roles and that unauthorized actions are blocked and logged.

steps.description: Login as different user roles (e.g., Specialist, Manager, Admin).
Attempt to access features outside assigned role permissions.
Verify access is denied and appropriate error or redirect occurs.
Verify audit logs capture the attempted unauthorized access attempts.

title: Asynchronous AI Denial Analysis Notification and Workflow
description: Verify that denial letters uploaded are processed asynchronously and users are notified upon completion with analysis results accessible via UI.

steps.description: Upload denial letter PDF.
Verify asynchronous processing is started and UI shows in-progress status.
Verify system sends a notification when analysis completes.
Open processed denial analysis results.
Verify denial reason extraction and root cause classification are displayed.

title: Conversational AI Assistant Case Discussion and Recommendations
description: Verify the conversational AI assistant supports case discussions providing evidence-based recommendations and document templates within the case review interface.

steps.description: Open a case in review mode.
Invoke the conversational AI assistant.
Ask for documentation improvement recommendations.
Verify AI assistant provides relevant evidence-based recommendations.
Request document templates from the assistant.
Verify templates are generated and usable.

title: Database Query and Indexing Integrity with Azure Search
description: Verify Azure Search integration correctly indexes clinical and denial data and that search queries return accurate and relevant results in the Data Explorer.

steps.description: Navigate to Data Explorer.
Execute multiple search queries against clinical and denial data.
Verify search results are relevant, complete, and ranked correctly.
Update clinical data entries and trigger re-indexing.
Verify updates reflect promptly in search results.

title: System Security Penetration Test and Audit Log Verification
description: Conduct comprehensive security penetration testing covering authentication, role-based access, data encryption, audit logging, and HIPAA compliance, verifying no security breaches or non-compliance issues.

steps.description: Perform penetration testing on authentication mechanisms, including multi-factor authentication.
Test access to unauthorized resources across different roles.
Verify audit logs capture all data access and modification activities.
Confirm no vulnerabilities or misconfigurations violating HIPAA ยง164.312 are present.
